verbs.description: [ARG0: photographer] [V: takes] [ARG1: a tumble] [ARG2: at football game] everyone on the sidelines of a football game knows you always have to stay alert and watch for runaway players but it not always avoidable like last friday night that when still photographer jan foster took a direct hit while at a local high school game ga jan foster atlanta football
